input.sentences: we had a lot of work to do to prepare all of the food for tonight .
i made a salad out of it with some pecans .
output.sentences: My husband brought home a basket of produce from the farmer's market.
He cut a delicious avocado to eat.
He added the avocado to a delicious salad with pecans.
My husband served me a glass of wine.
We enjoyed a delicious dessert after our delicious meal.
